stocks.impact_theory: Nvidia reported blockbuster Q4 FY2026 earnings with $68.13B revenue beating $66B estimates and EPS $1.62 beat, but provided Q1 guide slightly above yet not blowout, amid AI bubble fears. Economic implications: Signals sustained AI demand but slowing growth rate raises valuation concerns. Market psychology: 'Sell the news' after hype, dragging semis. Historical: Similar to 2023 post-earnings dips before rallies. Analogies: Like a sprinter slowing after record pace (overhype fatigue); fireworks fizzling post-peak (expectation mismatch).

news_impact_analysis.reasoning: Despite beats, stock -5% on weak sentiment from X/web, chip peers down, bubble worries; X sentiment mixed but negative reaction dominant.

potential_profit_risks.long_position: Buy dip for 5-10% rebound if AI narrative holds, target $195.
potential_profit_risks.short_position: Short for 10% downside to $170 on rotation out of tech, +15% potential.
potential_profit_risks.key_risks: Unexpected AI demand surge, Fed cuts boost, China export relief.

stocks.justification: Major event, clear data from earnings/news, high volume shift.

stocks.impact_theory: Q4 earnings EPS $0.31 beat $0.28, rev $240.8M beat, leading to +39% surge. Implications: Strong travel/security demand. Psychology: Undervalued beat sparks FOMO buying. Historical: Similar small-cap beats in travel post-COVID. Analogies: Rocket launch after quiet buildup; dam breaking on pent-up demand.

news_impact_analysis.reasoning: Earnings beat, new 52w high, positive analyst upgrades; limited X but web gainer lists confirm sentiment shift.

potential_profit_risks.key_risks: Market pullback, economic slowdown hits travel.

stocks.justification: Strong move but less news depth on why beat.

stocks.impact_theory: Q4 rev $797M +39% YoY beat, FY26 guide 27-30% growth, bookings $7.4B +46%. Implications: AI/public safety tech boom. Psychology: Validates growth story. Historical: Post-earnings surges in defense tech. Analogies: Tsunami of orders; snowball accelerating downhill.

news_impact_analysis.reasoning: Huge beat/guidance, +17% move, positive web coverage.

stocks.impact_theory: Q4 rev beat but FY26 guide miss, margin pressure. Implications: Slowing growth in domains/hosting. Psychology: Disappointment on AI lag. Historical: SaaS guidance misses tank stocks. Analogies: Balloon deflating; racehorse stumbling.

news_impact_analysis.reasoning: Guidance short, PT cuts by analysts, -14% drop.

potential_profit_risks.long_position: Value buy at low PE +10% rebound.

stocks.impact_theory: Profit-taking after trial milestone (ANKTIVA enrollment complete, 85% response), YTD +372%. Implications: Path to FDA 2026. Psychology: Overextension pullback. Historical: Biotech runs fade. Analogies: Rollercoaster dip; rubber band snapback.

news_impact_analysis.reasoning: -17% on profit take despite positive news, high valuation.
